body_html:
the error is pretty interesting. I restarted Jupyter notebook.
# many freaking signatures: print(torch.FloatTensor(1)) print(torch.IntTensor(1)) print(torch.DoubleTensor(1)) # no error right after initial run. #print(torch.DoubleTensor(0)) print(torch.DoubleTensor(2)) print(torch.ByteTensor(1)) print(torch.CharTensor(1)) print(torch.ShortTensor(1)) print(torch.LongTensor(1))

steps to reproduce the error:
1). run, no errors
2) repeat, no error
3) uncomment ..DoubleTensor(0), run, got an error (see below):
4) comment ..DouleTensor(0), run still have this error

`2.0980e+24
[torch.FloatTensor of size 1]

7.6169e+08
[torch.IntTensor of size 1]

ZeroDivisionError Traceback (most recent call last)
in ()
2 print(torch.FloatTensor(1))
3 print(torch.IntTensor(1))
----> 4 print(torch.DoubleTensor(1)) # ZeroDivisionError: float division by zero
5 #print(torch.DoubleTensor(0))
6 print(torch.DoubleTensor(2))

C:\Users\leo_g\AppData\Local\conda\conda\envs\py35\lib\site-packages\torch\tensor.py in str(self)
126 # characters to replace unicode characters with.
127 if sys.version_info > (3,):
--> 128 return _tensor_str._str(self)
129 else:
130 if hasattr(sys.stdout, 'encoding'):

C:\Users\leo_g\AppData\Local\conda\conda\envs\py35\lib\site-packages\torch_tensor_str.py in _str(self)
284 return '[{} with no dimension]\n'.format(torch.typename(self))
285 elif self.ndimension() == 1:
--> 286 strt = _vector_str(self)
287 elif self.ndimension() == 2:
288 strt = _matrix_str(self)

C:\Users\leo_g\AppData\Local\conda\conda\envs\py35\lib\site-packages\torch_tensor_str.py in _vector_str(self)
270 if self.numel() < PRINT_OPTS.threshold:
271 return (strt +
--> 272 '\n'.join(ident + fmt.format(val / scale) for val in self) +
273 '\n')
274 else:

C:\Users\leo_g\AppData\Local\conda\conda\envs\py35\lib\site-packages\torch_tensor_str.py in (.0)
270 if self.numel() < PRINT_OPTS.threshold:
271 return (strt +
--> 272 '\n'.join(ident + fmt.format(val / scale) for val in self) +
273 '\n')
274 else:

ZeroDivisionError: float division by zero`

body:
the error is pretty interesting. I restarted Jupyter notebook.
`# many freaking signatures:
print(torch.FloatTensor(1))
print(torch.IntTensor(1))
print(torch.DoubleTensor(1)) # no error right after initial run.
#print(torch.DoubleTensor(0))
print(torch.DoubleTensor(2))
print(torch.ByteTensor(1))
print(torch.CharTensor(1))
print(torch.ShortTensor(1))
print(torch.LongTensor(1))`

steps to reproduce the error:
1). run, no errors
2) repeat, no error
3) uncomment ..DoubleTensor(0), run, got an error (see below):
4) comment ..DouleTensor(0), run still have this error 

`2.0980e+24
[torch.FloatTensor of size 1]


 7.6169e+08
[torch.IntTensor of size 1]

---------------------------------------------------------------------------
ZeroDivisionError                         Traceback (most recent call last)
<ipython-input-5-3629c250c505> in <module>()
      2 print(torch.FloatTensor(1))
      3 print(torch.IntTensor(1))
----> 4 print(torch.DoubleTensor(1)) # ZeroDivisionError: float division by zero
      5 #print(torch.DoubleTensor(0))
      6 print(torch.DoubleTensor(2))

C:\Users\leo_g\AppData\Local\conda\conda\envs\py35\lib\site-packages\torch\tensor.py in __str__(self)
    126         # characters to replace unicode characters with.
    127         if sys.version_info > (3,):
--> 128             return _tensor_str._str(self)
    129         else:
    130             if hasattr(sys.stdout, 'encoding'):

C:\Users\leo_g\AppData\Local\conda\conda\envs\py35\lib\site-packages\torch\_tensor_str.py in _str(self)
    284         return '[{} with no dimension]\n'.format(torch.typename(self))
    285     elif self.ndimension() == 1:
--> 286         strt = _vector_str(self)
    287     elif self.ndimension() == 2:
    288         strt = _matrix_str(self)

C:\Users\leo_g\AppData\Local\conda\conda\envs\py35\lib\site-packages\torch\_tensor_str.py in _vector_str(self)
    270     if self.numel() < PRINT_OPTS.threshold:
    271         return (strt +
--> 272                 '\n'.join(ident + fmt.format(val / scale) for val in self) +
    273                 '\n')
    274     else:

C:\Users\leo_g\AppData\Local\conda\conda\envs\py35\lib\site-packages\torch\_tensor_str.py in <genexpr>(.0)
    270     if self.numel() < PRINT_OPTS.threshold:
    271         return (strt +
--> 272                 '\n'.join(ident + fmt.format(val / scale) for val in self) +
    273                 '\n')
    274     else:

ZeroDivisionError: float division by zero`
